response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a discounted rate. We believe this price reflects the outstanding value and benefits you will receive. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
